Norcent 24 Inch 720P HD LED Smart TV (N24H-S1) Build-In Web OS system, HDMI USB Optical Ports, with TTS Function
Home Entertainment Center: N24H-S1 boasts multi-viewing modes & built-in full range stereo speakers. A completely immersive surround sound format. Download apps such as Netflix, YouTube, Disney Plus, Amazon Prime Video and stream movies from your smartphone on TV, tons of games/films/news. All the content you love to enrich your life.
Elegant Design: Wall-mountable smart TV adds a stylish note to your living room with its slim bezel and stick stand design. You can wall mount it to save floor space or position it neatly on a cabinet. The narrow and thin frame design offers a broader vision and deeper immersive experience.
Get A Smarter Experience: N24H-S1 built-in with 2x HDMI, 1x USB, 1x Optical, Wifi. Enjoy a fluid browsing experience and faster control-switching between apps, streaming content and other media effortlessly, live TV, video on demand, apps and social media in one easy-to-browse navigation experience.
Updated Vision Display: LED HD Backlight TV Support 720P 480P 480i Signal With Resolution 1280*720

Product Description

Compatibility List:

Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra 5G, S22 Plus 5G, S22 5G, S21 Ultra 5G, S21 Plus 5G, S21 FE, S21 5G, S20 Ultra 5G, S20 Plus 5G, S20 5G, S20 FE

Samsung Galaxy S10, S10 Plus, S10e, S9, S9 Plus, S9 Active, S8, S8+, S8 Active

Samsung Galaxy Note 20 Ultra 5G, Note 20 5G, Note 10 Plus 5G, Note 10, Note 9, Note 8

Samsung Galaxy A02s, A03s, A03, A3, A5, A6, A7, A8, A9, A10, A10E, A11, A12

Samsung Galaxy A20, A21, A21s, A22, A31, A32, A40, A41, A42, A50, A51, A52, A53, A60, A70, A70s, A71 5G, A72, A80, A90

Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 2/ Z Fold 3/ Z Fold 4/ Z Flip/ Z Flip 3/ Z Flip 4/ F52

Samsung Galaxy Tab A 8.0(2018), Tab A 10.1 (2019), Tab 10.5, Tab A 8.0

Google Pixel, Pixel 2, Pixel 3, Pixel XL

LG G5, G6, G7, V20, V30 ThinQ Plus

One Plus, HTC, ZTE Axon, Nexus 6p

Other USB Type C Device

INPUT:

100 – 240 VAC ; 50-60HZ 0.50A

OUTPUT

9V/1.67A ; 5V/2.00A

What is Adaptive Fast Charging

This technology allows the smartphone to be charged with a faster speed, battery can charge faster up to 75% .

Will this product charge other Android phones quickly?

Yes. As long as your device supports Quick Charge QC2.0 & QC3.0, our wall charger block with Type-C cable will charge your device at a fast manner.

What is the difference between Quick Charge (QC) and Adaptive Fast charging (ADC)?

They are basically the same technology but brands marketed in different name. While Qualcomm named it Quick Charge, Samsung named it Adaptive Fast Charging.

Safe Fast Charger & Sync

Fast charger delivers up to output current of 15W, 75% faster than standard chargers, it also has the sync feature, most importantly, it is made for safe charging, it can intelligently recognize the battery type and status, will automatically stop charging when fully charged to prevent from short circuit, over-current, over-voltage, over-heating and over-charging.

Perfect for Any Occasions

These fasting charging kit is great for home, office, restaurant, tour, hotel etc.

High Quality ABS Material

Made of ABS material for the charger shell, shockproof and protect from over-heating & short-circuit

Easy to Carry

Compact classic design is portable to carry anywhere, slim and lightweight

【Quick Charge 3.0 Rapid Charging】Adaptive type c fast charger, enables your battery from zero to 50% in just 30 minutes, 75% faster than standard chargers.
【Fast & Sync】 USB c cell phone wall charger kit charges Samsung phones and tablets with USB 2. 0 ports at max high speed of 480 Mbps. It also charge USB-C devices without the Fast Charging feature as well, with up to a 2 Amp charging rate. Besides, it also has data transfer feature for convenient usage.
【Wide Compatibility】Compatible AFC (Adaptive Fast Charging): Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra, S21 Plus, S21, S20 Ultra, S20 Plus, S20, S20 FE, S10, S10e, S10+, S9, S9+, S9 Active, S8, S8+, S8 Active, Galaxy Note 20 Ultra , Note 20 5G, Note 10+ 5G, Note 10, Note 9, Note 8, Galaxy A90, A80, A71 5G, A70s, A52, A51, A20, Galaxy Z Fold2, Z Fold2 5G, Z Flip, Z Flip 5G, Fold, GOOGLE Pixel 1, 2, 3, 6, Pixel XL, LG G5, G6, G7, V20, V30 ThinQ Plus, One Plus, HTC, ZTE Axon, Nexus 6p and other USB Type C Device
【Package List】Replace or refund within one year without return, lifetime technical support. Package included: 2x Wall Charger Plug Box Brick and 2x Type-C [ 6 Feet ] Cord.

Compatibility List:

Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra 5G, S22 Plus 5G, S22 5G, S21 Ultra 5G, S21 Plus 5G, S21 FE, S21 5G, S20 Ultra 5G, S20 Plus 5G, S20 5G, S20 FE

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);
var onlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineInput’);
var offlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineInput’);
var onlineUrl = document.querySelector(‘#onlineUrl’);
var onlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlinePriceRaw’);
var onlineShippingRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlineShippingRaw’);
var onlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#onlineDay’);
var onlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#onlineMonth’);
var onlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#onlineYear’);
var onlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#onlineCalendar’);

var offlineStoreName = document.querySelector(‘#offlineStoreName’);
var offlineCity = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCity’);
var offlineState = document.querySelector(‘#offlineState’);
var offlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#offlinePriceRaw’);
var offlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#offlineDay’);
var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);
var offlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCalendar’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);
var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);
var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);
var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,
offlineStoreInputForm,
enableOfflineStoreRadio,

onlineCalendar,
offlineCalendar
);

Product Description

CUMKA Professional Led Desk Lamp Designed for Your Bright and Clear Life

CUMKA led desk light with usb charging port equipped 52 PCS eye protection LED, there is no flicker and no shadow, soft light that protects your eyes.
Professional office desk lamp with quality head and arm, non-slip bottom make CUMKA desk lamp sturdy and modern.
Long desk lamp head, cast a broader span of light .With the premium heat sink, which makes the usb desk lamp have better heat dissipation function and extend the lifespan of the desk lamp. Stable led desk light, non-flickering light, no harsh glare.
Memory function of desk Lamp would store the mode used last time, no need to readjust it when you turn it on next time.
LED desk lamp can be given to anyone you love and care as a gift on any occasion and festival, such as birthday and various festivals.

Warm and Soft Light Led Desk Lamp, No Flicker Touch Control Desk Lights with Smart Memory Function

*Desk Lamp Specifications

Max Power Voltage: 100V-240V, 50/60Hz

Power Output: 7W

Lumens: 650 LM

5 Color Temperatures: 3000-6000k

*Packing List

1 x Desk Lamp

1 x USB Power Cable

1 x User Manual

*One more USB charging port LED desk lamp help to charge another device when working, studying, reading.

*LED desk lamp with 5 color temperatures and 10 brightness levels to choose from warm light to cool white (3000K-6000K).

*Table lamp desk light with 30/60 mins of automatic timing setting, energy-saving and auto turn off when the time is up.

*Smooth surface with slide and touch control is easy to turn on/off, adjust color mode or brightness, set timing off.

*CUMKA LED Desk lamp with 50000 hours long lifespan ensure long time useage without changing the LED.

*Adjustable & Foldable desk lamps easy to tilt the head up 225°, arm down 90° and base swivels 160 ° to provide the best lighting angle. Easy fold flat to carry and space saving.

Wide Application Desk Lamps for Home Office School for Reading Studying Working

Various Lighting Modes & Eye-Friendly LEDCUMKA table lamp has 5 color temperatures (from 3000K to 6000K), each with 10 brightness levels,which equals 50 modes, just easily and quickly via sensitive touch sensor switch to adjust. This led lamp is perfect for work,reading and study. Desk lamp with usb charging port has energy-saving full-spectrum LED beads with soft eye protection features to relieve eye fatigue,no flicker,no shadow characteristics,meeting your needs in different environments.
Auto Timer Setting & Memory FunctionCUMKA small desk lamp has 30/60 minutes automatic light off timer, even when you fall asleep under the reading lamp while reading at night, the set time will automatically turn off the light when it’s up, saving power. The led desk lamp also has a memory function that allows you to memorize the color and brightness of the light and adjust it freely, making it easy to store your personal settings for the next use.
Multi-Angle Adjustments & Space SavingThe head of the office desk lamp can be rotated 225°, the arm can be folded 90°, the swivel base can be rotated 160° ，making the lighting more flexible, so it can be adjusted to any lighting angle you need at a large angle. The base of the led desk lamps measure 7×4.3 inches, this office lighting takes up little space on the table, but it can light up a large area. The desk lights are perfect for use in living room, reading room, bedroom, office, etc.
Long Lifespan & After-Sales ServiceCUMKA wireless charging lamp have a lifespan of 50000 hours, never need replace a bulb,40 times longer than a typical incandescent light, reducing energy consumption and saving power, we also provide a power cable for faster and more stable charging. We offer a 12-month warranty, if you have any questions about the desk lamps, please contact us anytime.

CUMKA Professional Led Desk Lamp Designed for Your Bright and Clear Life


  • CUMKA led desk light with usb charging port equipped 52 PCS eye protection LED, there is no flicker and no shadow, soft light that protects your eyes.
  • Professional office desk lamp with quality head and arm, non-slip bottom make CUMKA desk lamp sturdy and modern.
  • Long desk lamp head, cast a broader span of light .With the premium heat sink, which makes the usb desk lamp have better heat dissipation function and extend the lifespan of the desk lamp. Stable led desk light, non-flickering light, no harsh glare.
  • Memory function of desk Lamp would store the mode used last time, no need to readjust it when you turn it on next time.
  • LED desk lamp can be given to anyone you love and care as a gift on any occasion and festival, such as birthday and various festivals.


Warm and Soft Light Led Desk Lamp, No Flicker Touch Control Desk Lights with Smart Memory Function

*Desk Lamp Specifications

Max Power Voltage: 100V-240V, 50/60Hz

Power Output: 7W

Lumens: 650 LM

5 Color Temperatures: 3000-6000k

*Packing List

1 x Desk Lamp

1 x USB Power Cable

1 x User Manual




*One more USB charging port LED desk lamp help to charge another device when working, studying, reading.

*LED desk lamp with 5 color temperatures and 10 brightness levels to choose from warm light to cool white (3000K-6000K).

*Table lamp desk light with 30/60 mins of automatic timing setting, energy-saving and auto turn off when the time is up.

Read more




*Smooth surface with slide and touch control is easy to turn on/off, adjust color mode or brightness, set timing off.

*CUMKA LED Desk lamp with 50000 hours long lifespan ensure long time useage without changing the LED.

*Adjustable & Foldable desk lamps easy to tilt the head up 225°, arm down 90° and base swivels 160 ° to provide the best lighting angle. Easy fold flat to carry and space saving.

Read more


Wide Application Desk Lamps for Home Office School for Reading Studying Working

AMD Ryzen 9 5900HX : Powered by the latest AMD Ryzen 9 5900HX Processor(8 Cores, 16 Threads, 16M Cache, up to 4.60GHz), Radeon RX Vega 8 integrated graphics(up to 2100 MHz). 8 cores and 16 threads to divide and conquer multiple tasks at once.
RAM & Storage: 16GB DDR4 3200MHz dual channel RAM(upgradable to 64 GB), 512GB M.2 2280 PCle 3.0 SSD, performed multiple tasks with faster response speed and multi-threaded sensitive response. 2.5 inch SATA HDD Slot x2 for future expansion as your need.
Video Outputs & Liquid Metal Boosts Cooling: With four video output interfaces—HDMI (4K@60Hz) x2, and DisplayPort(4K@60Hz)x2. You can drive four independent 4K 60Hz displays for extreme productivity. Elevates performance with a premium liquid metal compound on the CPU, features direct CPU contact, a wide degree of open ventilation, and a smart fan that efficiently spins up when required to effectively transfer heat directly out the system for quiet and cool performance.
Strong Connectition: 1 x RJ45 2.5 Gigabit Ethernet Port, 5 x USB 3.0 Ports(Gen1) , 1 x USB-C Port, 1 x Clear CMOS , 2 x HDMI Ports, 2 x Display Ports, 2 x MIC, 2 x LINE OUT. WiFi 6, BT 5.1. Enough to connect various devices to meet various application scenarios.
Package & Other Functions: 1x HX90 Mini PC, 1x Mounting Bracket, 1x HDMI Cable, 1x Power Adapter, 1x Instruction Manual. Functions: RTC wake up / Wake on Lan / Auto Power on / Network boot.24/7 Support, professional technical team.

Multipurpose rotary tool – From woodworking, carpentry, car care to jewelry making and more; Not recommended for cutting, drilling, or routing.
The versatile 7760 Lite is the diyer’s go-to solution for light duty DIY and crafting projects. Includes 10 accessories to kick start your projects right out of the box.
Quick accessory changes – With the patented EZ Twist Nose Cap, accessory changes are easy and done without the need of a wrench. Collet size is 1.8”.
Variable speed – Seamlessly adjust to the ideal speed from 8,000 to 25,000 for optimal control & maneuverability
Easy battery charging – The rechargeable 4V Li-ion battery & convenient USB charger ensures that it’s ready whenever you are, Battery Size: 4-volt, Battery Amp Hours: 2Ah
Battery life indicator – LED light illuminates to notify you when the battery needs to be charged
Portable & lightweight – 360-degree soft grip material allows for comfort & precise control. Cordless design offers the freedom to take it anywhere

item.content:encoded:
Price: $18.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:25:25 UTC – Details)



Smartphone Control: Connect smart lamp with Go_sund_App to manage smart home conveniently. Feel free to power on/off, dim brightness, change colors or scenes of the table lamp with easy control via App. Only support 2.4GHz WiFi, no hub required
Hands-Free Voice Control: The bedside lamp works with Alexa and Google Home to free up your hands; You can switch on/off and even change the colors of your lamp by simple voice command. No worries about can’t find the light switch when you walk into a dark room.
Tap Top to Power on/off: The creative built-in touch sensor allows you to tap twice on the top of the lamp to turn it on or off. Manually work with the slide area to change brightness and colors. It is convenient to switch white and color modes with the front button directly
16 Million Colors and 8 Scenes: With 16 million colors, you can select any color in the spectrum via your phone App to create an atmosphere such as a romantic dinner or warm sleep. Scenes are able to be created for your desired ambiance, like multiple colors, 1% – 100% brightness, and color-changing speed.
Timer & Schedule: The smart lamp can be turned on or off automatically according to the time you set. Or set a schedule to turn off the lamp based on your family’s sleep schedule.

item.content:encoded:
Price: $29.99 - $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:32:18 UTC – Details)



1【16 Color Sunset Light & 4 Flashing Modes】The sunset lamp projector build-in RGB led, 16 kinds of light effect and 4 dynamic modes(Flash/Strobe/Fade/Smooth Effect) to choose from, provides a comfortable and romantic atmosphere. There are so many choice, you would find one you like.Suitable for children’s rooms, bedrooms, creating a different sunset projector light atmosphere, let you enjoy your leisure time and your family.
2【Smart APP and Remote Control Sunset Lamp】This is a smart sunlight lamp, you can change color of light, adjust brightness of lamp, choose light mode of this sunset lamp projector to make it become a party light or night light through APP on the phone or the remote control; Super convenient and versatile!
3【Portable size Rotatable and Adjustable】The lamp tripod can be rotated and adjusted.The Sunset Lamp head can be rotated 360 degrees, By changing the rotation angle and distance of the illuminator, different circular lights can be emitted from different angles, thereby bringing different effects. The farther the distance is, the larger the projection projected on the wall or ceiling.
4【Widely USE】It is very suitable for use as a background for photos, live broadcast and Vlog video shooting, as well as decoration for bedrooms, living rooms, corridors, cafes, studios, theme restaurants, bars, etc. At the same time, it is also very suitable for occasions such as dating, marriage proposal, parties, birthdays, family celebrations, garden parties and so on.
5 【365 DayQuality Assurance】If you are not 100% satisfied with sunset lights, just contact us and we will refund or replace your product immediately. If you have any questions about our sunlamp, please contact us first, and our support team will try to help you solve all problems…

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $27.97
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:16:33 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Humidifiers 250ML & 2L

Humidifiers 4L & 6L

Tank Cleaners & Heating Pads

Heating Pads & Massagers

Heating Wrap & Spin Scrubbers

THE PERFECT BALANCE BETWEEN POWER AND PORTABILITY: The lightweight compact, slim design makes it the perfect choice for any environment. A great humidifier for bedroom, office, baby room, or car, just turn it on, and enjoy better, healthier air
BOOST COMFORT LEVELS INSTANTLY: The ultrasonic cool mist humidifier comes with two mist modes – continuous & intermittent – able to change the environmental humidity in minutes. An intuitive one-button control, without needless and complicated settings, and an auto shut-off feature for your safety and calmness
INSTANT DRYNESS FIXER: YOUR LUNGS WILL THANK YOU! Our brand new humidifier for bedroom or office incorporates an elegant, compact design, making it super-portable and easy to use. Erie desk humidifier will fine-tune the humidity levels of your surroundings, allowing you to breathe a healthier air, and make your environment a lot more pleasant
SLEEP TIGHT: While you are sound asleep, our humidifiers for bedrooms moisturize the room at the 38dB noise level. The unit is as quiet as a ticking clock
SILENT STEALTHY FUNCTION FOR DREAMY NIGHTS: Great for sleeping, it also doubles as a night-light! Soft on your eyes, this nifty little feature makes it the ideal humidifier to use at night or as a baby humidifier for nursery, offering a relaxed, quiet environment for a sound and healthy sleep.
1-YEAR WARRANTY: RISK-FREE PURCHASE & HASSLE-FREE REPLACEMENT. Please don’t hesitate to reach out. We would be more than willing to assist! Just a little tip: to increase the life of the humidifier, we recommend using GENIANI Cotton Sticks.

Geniani Erie Humidifier

Introducing the newest innovation of air humidifiers for home or office!

The Erie Humidifier is a compact, yet powerful instant dryness fixer. Now you can have the capabilities of a room humidifier in a fabulous portable version. The mini humidifier also helps with the relief of allergy symptoms and dry cough.

Key features:

  • Sleek design & smart features
  • Portable, yet powerful
  • Offers up to 8 hours runtime
  • Silent action & night-light feature
  • Cost-effective compared to larger versions

Maintenance couldn’t be simpler!

Just a little effort to refill

The Erie personal humidifier can be refilled in seconds. Gently, with a single movement, unscrew the humidifier clockwise to fill it with water.

All-day or All-night Performance

You won’t have to worry about frequent refills since its 0.06 gal (250 ml) capacity is enough to last an entire office day, or night’s sleep.

Convenience at its best

This silent humidifier is such a great addition to an office, quietly working its magic for better air. It’s powered by most USB ports or sockets. Please note. The humidifier is not equipped with a battery; it is powered by a USB cord only.

One-button Control

Simple and intuitive one-button control to switch between operating modes. No hassle, just simple for optimal convenience.

Read more

Dry air is a definite plant killer. Just like your lungs need fresher air, so do most plants need a certain level of humidity to thrive. This small humidifier for plants will keep the air at optimum humidity level, so your lovely plants will have all the moisture they need to flourish.

At home – Perfect. At the office – Perfect. In the car – Perfect

Moisturize your skin

Moisturizing helps your skin stay young and reduces the chances of skin problems.

Safe for babies

With auto-shut off and a unique nightlight function, our humidifier is a nursery room must have! Ensure your children are receiving quality air throughout the night.

Quiet like breath

Ultra-quiet <30dB operating mode to deliver utterly silent operation.

Fits on cup holder

Designed in a sleek round style which allows it to fit in small spaces such as vehicle cup holders.

Read more
